name: Nayr Odyssey
description:
I'm quite tired, so I'm going to fill out and decorate this page further tomorrow.

Browsers prevent audio from playing without a mouse click, so you should click on the game screen if you intend to play! Otherwise when you do, the sounds might all play at once a little later.

Controls:

Action Input Pan camera WASD Turn Camera Arrow Keys Highlight/inspect Mouse Perform crew action Y/N/1/2/3/... "Snooze" crew members Z/X/C/V or right click on their icons
